metadata.title: CVE-2024-53200 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix null check for pipe_ctx->plane_state in hwss_setup_dppThis commit addresses a null pointer dereference issue inhwss_setup_dpp(). The issue could occur when pipe_ctx->plane_state isnull. The fix adds a check to ensure `pipe_ctx->plane_state` is not nullbefore accessing. This prevents a null pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
